summary: MY 1997 SUBARU LEGACY WAS TOTALLED IN A FRONT END COLLISION.  THE COLLISION OCCURRED AT 30-35 MPH, MY 97 LEGACY'S ENGINE WAS DESTROYED IN THIS COLLISION, AND I WAS CRUNCHED INTO THE STEERING WHEEL BECAUSE THE AIRBAGS DID NOT DEPLOY.  I SUFFERED INTERNAL INJURIES AND WAS TAKEN BY AMBULANCE TO THE HOSPITAL EMERGENCY ROOM.  BOTH AIRBAGS IN MY 97 LEGACY FAILED.  THE LEGACY WAS TOTALLED.
